mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_Num, notice_Title, notice_Content, notice_Id) values (notice_seq.nextval, #{notice_Title}, #{notice_Content}, #{notice_Id})
mapper.select: select notice_Num, notice_Title, notice_Content, notice_Id from notice order by notice_Num desc
select notice_Num, notice_Title, notice_Content, notice_Id from notice where notice_Num = #{notice_Num}
mapper.insert: insert into faq (faq_Code, faq_Title, faq_Kinds, faq_Content, faq_Id) values (faq_seq.nextval, #{faq_Title}, #{faq_Kinds}, #{faq_Content}, #{faq_Id})
mapper.select: select faq_Code, faq_Title, faq_Kinds, faq_Id from faq order by faq_Code desc
select faq_Code, faq_Title, faq_Kinds, faq_Content, faq_Id from faq where faq_Code=#{faq_Code}
select Name, Id, Pw, Major, Student_Num, Email, Phone_Num from member
select goods_Code, goods_Name, goods_Des, goods_Pic, goods_Date from goods where seller_Id = #{seller_Id} order by goods_Code desc
select goodsb_Code, goodsb_Title, goodsb_Des, goodsb_Date from goods_b where goodsb_Id = #{goodsb_Id} order by goodsb_Code desc
select goods_Code, trade_State from trade where buyer_Id = #{goodsb_Id} order by goods_Code desc
select goods_Code, trade_State from trade where buyer_Id = #{goodsb_Id} order by goods_Code desc
select trade_Code, goods_Code, seller_Id, buyer_Id, trade_State from trade where goods_Code = #{goods_Code}
mapper.insert: insert into review (review_Code, review_Content, review_Sta, review_Writer, review_Goods, review_Trader) values (review_seq.nextval, #{review_Content}, #{review_Sta}, #{review_Writer}, #{review_Goods}, #{review_Trader})
mapper.select: select review_Code, review_Content, review_Sta, review_Writer, review_Date, review_Goods, review_Trader from review where review_Writer = #{Id} order by review_Code desc
